articles.description: The British and Irish Lions are heavily beaten by Australia in a dramatic weather-delayed third Test in Sydney.
articles.title: Australia 22-12 Lions: Wallabies bounce back to deny Lions series whitewash

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says he was "just useless" after qualifying 12th for the Hungarian Grand Prix while his Ferrari team-mate Charles Leclerc took pole position.

articles.description: Charley Hull's six-under 66 puts her three shots behind leader Miyu Yamashita heading into the final round of the Women's Open.
articles.title: Women's Open 2025: Charley Hull three shots off Miyu Yamashita's lead after third round

articles.description: David Warner says Joe Root will need to "take the surfboard off his front leg" if he and England are to succeed in Australia this winter.
articles.title: The Hundred: David Warner casts doubt on Joe Root's Ashes form

articles.description: Son Heung-min, who has announced he is leaving Tottenham, will always be "worshipped" by Spurs fans, says club legend Micky Hazard.
articles.title: 'Like being with a rock star' - Son's 10 years at Spurs

articles.description: Marlie Packer's red card is the one downside to an emphatic Red Roses' win over an outclassed Spain in Leicester.
articles.title: England 97-7 Spain: Red Roses win but Marlie Packer sent off

articles.description: Masters champion Rory McIlroy is not in the field for the opening play-off event of the PGA Tour season next week.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: Masters champion to miss PGA Tour play-off opener in Memphis
